医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
英国四分之三的信托机构仍然使用纸质患者笔记和药物图表尽管在电子记录和处方方面取得了进展，但接受《英国医学杂志》调查的英格兰四分之三的信托机构仍然依赖纸质患者笔记和药物图表。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Three-quarters-of-trusts-in-England-still-use-paper-patent-notes-and-drug-charts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Three-quarters-of-trusts-in-England-still-use-paper-patent-notes-and-drug-charts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35159fd1-6074-4385-9b70-6c503a93cc0d Thu, 14 Sep 2023 15:46:30 -0400 Three quarters of trusts in England still use paper patient notes and drug charts
麻省理工学院的研究揭示了为什么免疫疗法并不适用于所有癌症患者该块已损坏或丢失。您可能缺少内容或者您可能需要启用原始模块。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/MIT-study-reveals-why-immunotherapy-doesnt-work-for-all-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/MIT-study-reveals-why-immunotherapy-doesnt-work-for-all-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ceaba71-ad70-4c5a-b70f-45fd6acd986e Thu, 14 Sep 2023 15:35:42 -0400 MIT study reveals why immunotherapy doesn't work for all cancer patients
Henry Ford Health 在美国进行首例 K-Clip 手术治疗严重三尖瓣反流来自亨利·福特健康中心结构性心脏病中心的介入心脏病专家团队最近成为美国和西半球第一个使用研究中的 K-Clip™ 经血管三尖瓣修复系统修复患有严重三尖瓣反流的患者心脏瓣膜的团队。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Henry-Ford-Health-performs-first-K-Clip-procedure-in-the-US-to-treat-severe-tricuspid-regurgitation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Henry-Ford-Health-performs-first-K-Clip-procedure-in-the-US-to-treat-severe-tricuspid-regurgitation.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c590753-5a50-485e-8891-ac1f9363b87a Thu, 14 Sep 2023 15:26:02 -0400 Henry Ford Health performs first K-Clip procedure in the U.S. to treat severe tricuspid regurgitation
纽约大学兰格尼分校的医生完成了最长记录的人体猪肾移植手术经过 61 天的观察，纽约大学兰格尼健康中心的医生本月完成了最长的记录在案的基因工程猪肾在人体内发挥功能的病例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/NYU-Langone-doctors-complete-longest-documented-case-of-pig-kidney-transplant-in- human-body.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/NYU-Langone-doctors-complete-longest-documented-case-of-pig-kidney-transplant-in- human-body.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fcb4edba-5b67-4de7-91e7-6534964e6941 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 15:18:38 -0400 NYU Langone doctors complete longest-documented case of pig kidney transplant in human body
研究表明层粘连蛋白可能在减缓乳腺肿瘤的进展中发挥作用细胞能够将机械变化转化为生物反应。这一过程被称为机械转导，在乳腺癌等实体瘤的进展中发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Research-suggests-laminin-could-play-role-in-slowing-progression-of-breast-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Research-suggests-laminin-could-play-role-in-slowing-progression-of-breast-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c683291-a523-4ec7-8de2-b76723c18116 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 15:10:13 -0400 Research suggests laminin could play role in slowing progression of breast tumors
利用生物纳米天线的非凡能力来瞄准和杀死脑肿瘤研究人员发现了一种利用带电分子触发自我毁灭来瞄准和杀死难以治疗的脑肿瘤中的癌细胞的新方法，该方法可以开发成手术期间使用的喷雾治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Harnessing-the-extraordinary-capability-of-bio-nanoantennae-to-target-and-kill-brain-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/Harnessing-the-extraordinary-capability-of-bio-nanoantennae-to-target-and-kill-brain-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69515853-3343-4f2b-82c7-4ec4cf3c464c Thu, 14 Sep 2023 14:50:36 -0400 Harnessing the extraordinary capabilities of bio-nanoantennae to target and kill brain tumors
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 拨款 320 万美元研究独特的 DNA 环如何导致致命的儿童脑肿瘤Lukas Chavez 博士获得了美国国立卫生研究院 320 万美元的资助，用于研究癌细胞中发现的独特 DNA 环如何驱动致命的儿童脑肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/NIH-awards-2432-million-to-study-how-unique-DNA-circles-drive-deadly-pediatric-brain-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/NIH-awards-2432-million-to-study-how-unique-DNA-circles-drive-deadly-pediatric-brain-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fd42652-d47e-40c3-b793-9f4e5f1a5ab7 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 14:32:46 -0400 NIH awards $3.2 million to study how unique DNA circles drive deadly pediatric brain tumors
UKHSA 的旗舰 SIREN 研究进入新阶段，继续监测呼吸道病原体该研究的下一阶段将被称为 SIREN 2.0，于 2023 年 9 月开始。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/UKHSA-flagship-SIREN-study-enters-new-phase-to-continue-surveillance-of-respiratory-pathogens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/UKHSA-flagship-SIREN-study-enters-new-phase-to-continue-surveillance-of-respiratory-pathogens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd8f57fb-d20b-4755-94ce-34586d6b3ff1 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 14:20:09 -0400 UKHSA's flagship SIREN study enters new phase to continue surveillance of respiratory pathogens
新型纳米薄超级细菌杀死材料可以彻底改变伤口愈合研究人员发明了一种纳米薄的超级细菌杀死材料，有一天可以将其整合到伤口敷料和植入物中，以预防或治愈细菌感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/New-nano-thin-superbug-slaying-material-could-revolutionize-wound-healing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/New-nano-thin-superbug-slaying-material-could-revolutionize-wound-healing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac42927a-fd16-4f79-ae15-1323a1dcb2f2 Thu, 14 Sep 2023 13:57:51 -0400 New nano-thin superbug-slaying material could revolutionize wound healing
UT Health San Antonio 和 UTSA 推出美国首个医学和人工智能 MD/MS 项目德克萨斯大学圣安东尼奥健康科学中心 (UT Health San Antonio) 的 Joe R. 和 Teresa Lozano Long 医学院和德克萨斯大学圣安东尼奥大学学院 (UTSA) 正式启动第一个已知项目在美国，将医学和人工智能结合起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/UT-Health-San-Antonio-and-UTSA-launch-first-US-MDMS-program-in-medicine-and-artificial-intelligence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230914/UT-Health-San-Antonio-and-UTSA-launch-first-US-MDMS-program-in-medicine-and-artificial-intelligence.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=911aefe7-6e02-421e-8a51-3d91da39c2fa Thu, 14 Sep 2023 13:49:59 -0400 UT Health San Antonio and UTSA launch first U.S. MD/MS program in medicine and artificial intelligence
